# text

**Instance Property**

The string that the label node displays.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var text: String? { get set }
```

```swift
var text: String? { get set }
```

## Discussion

This property is ignored if attributedText is defined.

## Setting a Label’s Text

- **attributedText**: The attributed string displayed by the label.
